storyInfo: Saria shows up and saves the Doctor, at which point the three Rhodes Islanders are shocked to discover the power armor that attacked them had no pilot. Outside the city, the Pioneers receive a stern answer from Ferdinand.

attributes.content: I... can't believe it.
attributes.name: Mechanist

attributes.content: I had signal interference active and everything. Even Closure's own latest drone gen wouldn't detect our location.
attributes.name: Mechanist

attributes.content: What sensory tech is this power armor using?
attributes.name: Mechanist

attributes.content: I don't want to draw attention...
attributes.name: Mechanist

attributes.content: Hold on tight, Doctor.
attributes.name: Mechanist

attributes.content: 10% power, aim—
attributes.name: Mechanist

attributes.content: Bingo.
attributes.name: Mechanist

attributes.content: Clear damage to right arm plating detected.
attributes.name: Mechanist

attributes.content: No reduction in speed. Showed no signs of slowing when hit, either.
attributes.name: Mechanist

attributes.content: Who's in that suit? Do they not feel pain?
attributes.name: Mechanist

attributes.content: Damage to left arm.
attributes.name: Mechanist

attributes.content: Damage to lower right leg.
attributes.name: Mechanist

attributes.content: Doctor, it's not reacting to the damage at all.
attributes.name: Mechanist

attributes.content: If we want to stop it, I'll need to paralyze its power core in one shot—
attributes.name: Mechanist

attributes.content: Come on, this makes no sense.
attributes.name: Mechanist

attributes.content: Even the most well-trained soldier wouldn't have this much tolerance.
attributes.name: Mechanist

attributes.content: You're right.
By mere fact of living, no individual can wholly suppress their most basic nervous responses.
A hand smashes through the power armor's core. Countless mechanical fragments burst out like fireworks, just as the blood of a fellow lifeform would.
With no time to waste, that hand pulls out.

The mecha-fragment extracted by her sheer force turns into dust, together with the pure white plating covering her five digits. It all drifts down to the floor, where it forms a paper-thin calcium crystal layer.
The power armor lies on the ground, the heat of its energy snuffed, a clean hole left through its torso.
You—pierced that power armor's core barehanded?
attributes.name: Mechanist

attributes.content: That's a might of mights. And definitely a lot quieter than my defensive cannon.
attributes.name: Mechanist

attributes.content: Doctor, looks like the Bureau of, uh... Originium whatever won't be taking us in for attempted bombing today.
attributes.name: Mechanist

attributes.options: I do NOT want new criminal records for Rhodes Island.;I do NOT miss Columbian jail even a little bit.

attributes.content: No need, Doctor, Mechanist.
attributes.name: Saria

attributes.content: I'm the one getting Rhodes Island involved in Rhine's internal affairs—
attributes.name: Saria

attributes.content: I have a duty to ensure you don't come to any harm.
attributes.name: Saria

attributes.content: Ferdinand was right on the money.
attributes.name: Ho'olheyak

attributes.content: Rhodes Island's people have already found Saria.
attributes.name: Ho'olheyak

attributes.content: Should we maintain pursuit, ma'am?
attributes.name: Columbian Mercenary

attributes.content: If I stuffed you inside that power armor just now, do you think you'd survive?
attributes.name: Ho'olheyak

attributes.content: Relax.
attributes.name: Ho'olheyak

attributes.content: Just a hypothetical.
attributes.name: Ho'olheyak

attributes.content: Ma'am, no matter how powerful Saria is, there's only three of them.
attributes.name: Columbian Mercenary

attributes.content: We've got them way outnumbered, and outgunned with our secret weapon.
attributes.name: Columbian Mercenary

attributes.content: Underestimate the enemy at your own peril.
attributes.name: Ho'olheyak

attributes.content: Haven't you been around Rhine Lab enough to learn? The punier a scientist looks, the harder she might just pulverize you.
attributes.name: Ho'olheyak

attributes.content: Y-You mean that mechanist, or the professor-looking one with the hidden face? They can't be stronger than Rhine's Defense Director, right?
attributes.name: Columbian Mercenary

attributes.content: Rhodes Island... they've got talent for days.
attributes.name: Ho'olheyak

attributes.content: Let's go. I'm in love with that hypothetical just now, and I've got a few new ideas I want to try out.
attributes.name: Ho'olheyak

attributes.content: Good evening, Colonel.
attributes.name: Ferdinand

attributes.content: Clooney...
attributes.name: Colonel's Voice

attributes.content: Give me a rundown of what's going on at the site.
attributes.name: Colonel's Voice

attributes.content: Just minor boat-rocking... You know how hard it is for Pioneers to be satisfied, no matter how generous you get with their terms.
attributes.name: Ferdinand

attributes.content: Initiative is their strong point, and it forms the basis of Columbia's endless expansion, but sometimes it carries with it a little... hassle.
attributes.name: Ferdinand

attributes.content: So it's hassle. Unhassle it, then.
attributes.name: Colonel's Voice

attributes.content: I want to see the results you promised, not Rhine Lab in the gossip rags.
attributes.name: Colonel's Voice

attributes.content: Remember, you aren't the only tech company in Columbia.
attributes.name: Colonel's Voice

attributes.content: Understood.
attributes.name: Ferdinand

attributes.content: Rest assured, Colonel.
attributes.name: Ferdinand

attributes.content: Rhine Lab's products will not let you down.
attributes.name: Ferdinand

attributes.content: Sir, got a whole crew wanting out of this now.
attributes.name: Frontier Team Member

attributes.content: They say your plan's hopeless, that nobody's gonna listen to us. We can try everything we want, we'll never get our voices out.
attributes.name: Frontier Team Member

attributes.content: They're also asking who cares what Rhine Lab's up to.
attributes.name: Frontier Team Member

attributes.content: Like, we just need to get this work done sooner, get our money, move onto the next place and keep going.
attributes.name: Frontier Team Member

attributes.content: As for the guys who... went missing, well, their luck just ran out. The Pioneer Teams out in the deep wastes see a lot more dead every year than we do, anyway.
attributes.name: Frontier Team Member

attributes.content: I get it.
attributes.name: Sonny

attributes.content: Tell them to just hold on a little longer. I'll bring our people back.
attributes.name: Sonny

attributes.content: So what's your plan?
attributes.name: Frontier Team Member

attributes.content: I'm gonna head out for a bit.
attributes.name: Sonny

attributes.content: Out? Isn't... isn't that too dangerous?
attributes.name: Frontier Team Member

attributes.content: If the cops sent sharpshooters, they might just be waiting for you to come out.
attributes.name: Frontier Team Member

attributes.content: Sounds like a good deal to me.
attributes.name: Sonny

attributes.content: Wh-What? You're keeping your head together, right?
attributes.name: Frontier Team Member

attributes.content: A police sharpshooter, right? Might just be an old friend of mine. Crack shot with a crossbow. If this is how it's gotta be, it's not gonna hurt too bad.
attributes.name: Sonny

attributes.content: Sonny...
attributes.name: Frontier Team Member

attributes.content: Dr. Urbica, Doc Moore—
attributes.name: Sonny

attributes.content: I need you to come out for a walk.
attributes.name: Sonny

attributes.content: You can drop the pretense. Do we have a choice here?
attributes.name: Elena

attributes.content: Afraid not. Keep your chin up.
attributes.name: Sonny

attributes.content: Once the folks outside get to see the score, maybe they'll change their minds, open up to taking our demands seriously.
attributes.name: Sonny

attributes.content: Officer, we've got movement!
attributes.name: Rhine Defense Member

attributes.content: Drones, prepare to fire—
attributes.name: Rhine Defense Member

attributes.content: No. Hold your fire.
attributes.name: Mary

attributes.content: Officer...?
attributes.name: Rhine Defense Member

attributes.content: We can't hurt the hostages.
attributes.name: Mary

attributes.content: You, uh... Dr. Silence, over here.
attributes.name: Mary

attributes.content: Is there a development, ma'am?
attributes.name: Silence

attributes.content: Take a look through the binoculars. Are those your two colleagues behind S... the Pioneer?
attributes.name: Mary

attributes.content: Sir—th—the comm lit up!
attributes.name: Frontier Team Member

attributes.content: Give it.
attributes.name: Sonny

attributes.content: Knew it'd be you.
attributes.name: Sonny

attributes.content: I could say the same thing.
attributes.name: Mary

attributes.content: You, uh... you made rank, right? Didn't get the chance to congratulate you.
attributes.name: Sonny

attributes.content: Who knew you'd stay at that precinct so long... You keep getting all this hassle from the frontier.
attributes.name: Sonny

attributes.content: And I never thought you'd end up so... depraved.
attributes.name: Mary

attributes.content: You still remember any of the classes you took? Your law courses?
attributes.name: Mary

attributes.content: You still remember... the shit you said to me, the day I joined the force?
attributes.name: Mary

attributes.content: 'That's great! We'll be partners again. It'll be just like all those games we played as kids. We'll protect Columbia's peace, bring the bad guys to justice—'
attributes.name: Mary

attributes.content: Hah... how's that irony? You're bad guy number one right here and now.
attributes.name: Mary

attributes.content: Mary...
attributes.name: Sonny

attributes.content: What's all that crap your boys are holding? Homemade weapons?
attributes.name: Mary

attributes.content: Drop those things before you embarrass yourselves any more.
attributes.name: Mary

attributes.content: You degraded yourself this far, but you still have an option. One final option.
attributes.name: Mary

attributes.content: Let those two innocent ladies next to you go.
attributes.name: Mary

attributes.content: No. That's not in the cards for now.
attributes.name: Sonny

attributes.content: Dammit. You're inching over the cliff here.
attributes.name: Mary

attributes.content: Sure, the government lets a criminal join the Pioneers if he doesn't want to do hard time.
attributes.name: Mary

attributes.content: But if... you break the law again out on the frontier? What charges does that buy you?
attributes.name: Mary

attributes.content: Answer me, counsel!
attributes.name: Mary

attributes.content: Don't call me that, Mary, I'm begging you...
attributes.name: Sonny

attributes.content: You're trying to guilt-trip me.
attributes.name: Mary

attributes.content: Yeah, I feel guilty now... guilty I let you go when you broke into my house. I should've hauled your ass straight to the station.
attributes.name: Mary

attributes.content: That was a long time ago. I mean, I'd only just...
attributes.name: Sonny

attributes.content: ...I'm sorry. I've always been sorry about that.
attributes.name: Sonny

attributes.content: But this time, I have a reason for doing all this. You have to hear me out, please.
attributes.name: Sonny

attributes.content: Sir!
attributes.name: Frontier Team Member

attributes.content: What?
attributes.name: Sonny

attributes.content: The doc, the doc, she...
attributes.name: Frontier Team Member

attributes.content: Doc Moore?
attributes.name: Sonny

attributes.content: Configuration... error... entering... power save mode...
attributes.name: Ptilopsis

attributes.content: Oh, shoot. Joyce...
attributes.name: Elena

attributes.content: What's happening to her, Doctor?
attributes.name: Sonny

attributes.content: You can tell. She's having an attack.
attributes.name: Elena

attributes.content: What?! I—Is it Oripathy?
attributes.name: Frontier Team Member

attributes.content: C'mon, I got her! There's drugs for her, right? I... I can't do injections...
attributes.name: Frontier Team Member

attributes.content: Ngh...
attributes.name: Ptilopsis

attributes.content: C'mon, she looks like hell!
attributes.name: Frontier Team Member

attributes.content: I... I got this first-aid treatment band Rhine gave us. This does something for Oripathy flare-ups, right?
attributes.name: Frontier Team Member

attributes.content: I'll put it on her...
attributes.name: Frontier Team Member

attributes.content: You're willing to give your own emergency care device to Joyce?
attributes.name: Elena

attributes.content: If you hand her that band, your odds of survival go down significantly on the off-chance you get a sudden attack.
attributes.name: Elena

attributes.content: The doc's been good to us all this time!
attributes.name: Frontier Team Member

attributes.content: I don't want anything to happen to her...
attributes.name: Frontier Team Member

attributes.content: You say as the ones who kidnapped me and Joyce.
attributes.name: Elena

attributes.content: We never wanted to do you dirty.
attributes.name: Sonny

attributes.content: I'm sorry... We're just a bunch of selfish nobodies.
attributes.name: Sonny

attributes.content: Are the comms still going?
attributes.name: Silence

attributes.content: Ma'am, would you mind giving me permission to talk to the Pioneers?
attributes.name: Silence

attributes.content: The Liberi experiencing an attack is my colleague, and my good friend.
attributes.name: Silence

attributes.content: And more important still, I am her attending physician.
attributes.name: Silence

attributes.content: I want to gather her situation from the Pioneers. Judging by their reactions, they clearly aren't unconcerned for her.
attributes.name: Silence

attributes.content: Go nuts.
attributes.name: Mary

attributes.content: But you don't have much time.
attributes.name: Mary

attributes.content: I just got orders from on high. If the Pioneers refuse to cooperate for another ten minutes, we'll cut all comms to the test site... along with all power to their living quarters.
attributes.name: Mary

attributes.content: Y—You'll cut the electricity?
attributes.name: Greyy

attributes.content: Day-night temperature swings are massive in the barrens... They'll be freezing by midnight!
attributes.name: Greyy

attributes.content: And there's several late-stage Oripathy patients among the Pioneers...
attributes.name: Greyy

attributes.content: They need medical facilities to live!
attributes.name: Greyy

attributes.content: I know.
attributes.name: Mary

attributes.content: That's what makes this a warning.
attributes.name: Mary

attributes.content: They need to know how serious Rhine and the police are here.
attributes.name: Mary

attributes.content: All their protests and demands have to be founded on a legal basis... Once they take the criminal route, nobody's going to hear them out.
attributes.name: Mary

attributes.content: But... aren't you friends with that Pioneer leader?
attributes.name: Greyy

attributes.content: Friends?
attributes.name: Mary

attributes.content: The moment he abandoned himself, there was nothing left to say.
attributes.name: Mary

attributes.content: How is she?
attributes.name: Sonny

attributes.content: Real-time blood-crystal density's dropping. Eye movement indices are still highly irregular.
attributes.name: Elena

attributes.content: Eye movement indices?
attributes.name: Sonny

attributes.content: Due to her Oripathy's focus lying in the brain.
Any fluctuation in her condition will impact her nervous system, cause her to fall into deep sleep, and go so far as to trigger epileptic attacks.
Huh? Who's there?
attributes.name: Sonny

attributes.content: The comms are still open.
attributes.name: Elena

attributes.content: Hello, sir.
attributes.name: Silence

attributes.content: I'm Joyce Moore's attending physician. My name is Silence.
attributes.name: Silence

attributes.content: Doc Silence.
attributes.name: Sonny

attributes.content: Firstly, I'd like to offer you my thanks.
attributes.name: Silence

attributes.content: Joyce's condition has only stabilized so quickly with your aid, and that of the other Pioneers.
attributes.name: Silence

attributes.content: You're gonna thank us kidnappers, huh?
attributes.name: Sonny

attributes.content: In return, and please trust me when I say this, we really, truly wish to assist you.
attributes.name: Silence

attributes.content: We still have five minutes before your comms, and power to your living quarters, are simultaneously cut—
attributes.name: Silence

attributes.content: Sir—w—we've got a blackout!
attributes.name: Frontier Team Member

attributes.content: It seems they've acted ahead of schedule.
attributes.name: Silence

attributes.content: Don't sweat it. I gotta appreciate you being willing to warn us.
attributes.name: Sonny

attributes.content: I gathered from ma'am Mary that you'd like a dialogue with Rhine Lab's upper management.
attributes.name: Silence

attributes.content: Can I ask why that is?
attributes.name: Silence

attributes.content: I wanna beg them to stop the experiments they're doing here.
attributes.name: Sonny

attributes.content: To what?
attributes.name: Silence

attributes.content: You're a good doc, same as Doc Moore here. But something tells me stopping a project this big's out of your hands.
attributes.name: Sonny

attributes.content: Can you tell the Rhine Lab boss that this experiment is seriously, wicked dangerous?
attributes.name: Sonny

attributes.content: Sir, do you have any proof?
attributes.name: Silence

attributes.content: Even if I did, would you believe me...? A lone Pioneer at the end of his rope?
attributes.name: Sonny

attributes.content: Officer, we're all set. We can cut the site's comms at any time.
attributes.name: Rhine Defense Member

attributes.content: Wait for Doc Silence to finish.
attributes.name: Mary

attributes.content: But the Director's demanding immediate...
attributes.name: Rhine Defense Member

attributes.content: Sorry, what police rank does your director hold? Remind me.
attributes.name: Mary

attributes.content: Tell fricking Ferdinand that saving people is my job. I'm not taking him on a ride-along here!
attributes.name: Mary

attributes.content: The Director's been in contact with the commissioner, Officer. They drew up this plan together.
attributes.name: Rhine Defense Member

attributes.content: Director... Ferdinand?
attributes.name: Silence

attributes.content: I never imagined Defense would fall under Energy's purview.
attributes.name: Silence

attributes.content: Er...
attributes.name: Rhine Defense Member

attributes.content: If Ferdinand feels that Structural is his to rule too, then I would not mind resigning from Rhine Lab, effective immediately.
attributes.name: Silence

attributes.content: Joyce... Joyce!
attributes.name: Elena

attributes.content: Is she... asleep?
attributes.name: Sonny

attributes.content: She's lost consciousness.
attributes.name: Elena

attributes.content: If we don't get her treatment in time, she... she'll experience brain death before long.
attributes.name: Elena

attributes.content: Sir, I am preparing to enter the site now.
attributes.name: Silence

attributes.content: I understand your concerns, so I would like to reassure you, I will not be carrying any weapons.
attributes.name: Silence

attributes.content: Don't do anything stupid, Doctor!
attributes.name: Mary

attributes.content: I know full well what I am doing.
attributes.name: Silence

attributes.content: Sir, I will not allow any police officers... nor Defense personnel to follow me.
attributes.name: Silence

attributes.content: Researcher Silence, I will report your conduct to the Director... Director Parvis.
attributes.name: Rhine Defense Member

attributes.content: I am entering Test Site 359 under my status as a Rhodes Island Operator—
attributes.name: Silence

attributes.content: Me too...
attributes.name: Greyy

attributes.content: —And my electrical engineering colleague will accompany me.
attributes.name: Silence

attributes.content: We will provide medical services, free of charge, to the Oripathy patients on-site.
attributes.name: Silence

attributes.content: Not just for my friend, but for all of you.
attributes.name: Silence

attributes.content: I do not care what choices Rhine Lab makes in the wake of this.
attributes.name: Silence

attributes.content: I only know this—treating the Infected is constant to the Rhodes Island code of conduct.
attributes.name: Silence
